issue.title: [Python] Extend tests for python serialization
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1390](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1390). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The code that was merged in ARROW-759 should have more test coverage.

As a starting point, we can port tests from https://github.com/jsonpickle/jsonpickle/tree/master/tests

comments.body:
